summary: Adds scale armor to the game
descriptionHtml:
This mod was created to add medium style armor to the game. If you like armor that looks like it belongs in WOW it's probably not for you, this armor is based on actual armor not fantasy crap.

[b][color=#ff0000][size=6]This File cannot be used in any way shape or form as content for a paid mod.[/size][/color][/b]


The mod includes
- Steel Scale Hauberk
- Leather Scale Hauberk
- Gauntlets (leather/steel)
- Boots (leather/steel)
- Helmet (medium/heavy)

This mod is compatable with both genders

Installation Guide:
Place the meshes folder, texture folder, and the .esp file in your data folder.

Bugs/contribution: please comment on any bugs or on any improvements I am eager to hear new ideas.

credit:
Bethesda - models/texture/game

Future Versions:
- light version
- add to npcs and leveled lists
- maybe just maybe a new faction

Disclaimer-
Some mods may conflict at the moment midas magic may be making textures do wierd things.
author: OdinsWarrior
